testcase.name: Update staff under a manager
testcase.system-out: Given a STAFF manager with id 1.............................................passed When I send a STAFF PUT request to update staff under manager with data.....passed Then the STAFF response should contain updated staff data...................passed And the STAFF API response status code should be 200........................passed

testcase.name: Delete a staff under a manager
